posts.title: Turn Any Text into Beautiful Mind Maps
posts.author: Fu-Jie
posts.description: Intelligently analyzes text content and generates interactive mind maps to help users structure and visualize knowledge.

posts.title: Export to Excel
posts.author: Fu-Jie
posts.description: Extracts tables from chat messages and exports them to Excel (.xlsx) files with smart formatting.

posts.title: Async Context Compression
posts.author: Fu-Jie
posts.description: This filter automatically compresses long conversation contexts by intelligently summarizing and removing intermediate messages while preserving critical information, thereby significantly reducing token consumption.

posts.title: Flash Card
posts.author: Fu-Jie
posts.description: Quickly generates beautiful flashcards from text, extracting key points and categories.

posts.title: Smart Infographic
posts.author: jeff
posts.description: AI-powered infographic generator based on AntV Infographic. Supports professional templates, auto-icon matching, and SVG/PNG downloads.

posts.title: Export to Word (Enhanced Formatting)
posts.author: Fu-Jie
posts.description: Export the current conversation to a formatted Word doc with syntax highlighting, AI-generated titles, and perfect Markdown rendering (tables, quotes, lists).

posts.title: 智能信息图
posts.author: jeff
posts.description: 基于 AntV Infographic 的智能信息图生成插件。支持多种专业模板，自动图标匹配，并提供 SVG/PNG 下载功能。

posts.title: 导出为 Word-支持公式、流程图、表格和代码块
posts.slug: 导出为_word_支持公式流程图表格和代码块_8a6306c0
posts.author: Fu-Jie
posts.description: 将当前对话内容从 Markdown 转换并导出为 Word (.docx) 文件，支持中英文无乱码。
posts.url: https://openwebui.com/posts/导出为_word_支持公式流程图表格和代码块_8a6306c0

posts.title: 闪记卡生成插件
posts.author: Fu-Jie
posts.description: 快速将文本提炼为精美的学习记忆卡片，支持核心要点提取与分类。

posts.title: 异步上下文压缩
posts.author: Fu-Jie
posts.description: 在 LLM 响应完成后进行上下文摘要和压缩
